Isshiki uses Daikokuten to bring forth contained flames for a surprise attack when facing an opponent.

== Trivia == 
* While unnamed in the anime, it was named in ''[[Naruto x Boruto: Ultimate Ninja Storm Connections]]''.

[[pl:Daikokuten: Gōen]]
